item.title: Earthlight VR is the closest you can get to outer space without leaving Earth
item.description:
Earthlight VR is the closest you can get to outer space without leaving Earth

On a mission to fix a leaky valve, I'm pulling myself rung by rung along the International Space Station. The Earth is shimmering below in a way I've only seen in pictures, and if I turn my head, I can see the outer reaches of the station, and beyond them, endless space.

item.title: Recognizing Trouble in VR
item.description:
Recognizing Trouble in VR

I recently wrote an article on my favorite virtual reality games. I think that ensuring people experience the best virtual reality games is extremely important to the health of the medium- a bad VR game is all it takes to make someone lose interest in VR... and maybe lose their lunch, too.

item.title: Home
item.description:
Home

VR World Congress is the UK's biggest and best conference focused on the world of Virtual Reality, taking place in Bristol on the 12th of April, 2016.

item.title: Affected
item.description:
Affected

Affected offers a new level of immersion for gamers, heightened feelings of tension and more importantly, unprecedented levels of fear. The Oculus Rift has ushered in a new era in gaming and as a result, a new dimension in which to experience the ultimate in scare factors.

item.title: White Day - SCEK Press Conference Trailer (Gameplay)
item.description:
White Day - SCEK Press Conference Trailer (Gameplay)

Sony revealed debut gameplay footage in a new trailer for PSVR title White Day, a new reveal for Sony's virtual reality (VR) system. The game was revealed as part of Sony Computer Entertainment Korea (SCEK)'s November 4th press conference presented by Shuhei Yoshida.
